amendment.description: To permit the use of remaining fiscal year 2003 funds to carry out the program of loans and loan guarantees to provide access to broadband telecommunications services in rural areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2123 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2123 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142) To permit the use of remaining fiscal year 2003 funds to carry out the program of loans and loan guarantees to provide access to broadband telecommunications services in rural areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2123 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2123 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Dorgan.
